wikipedia_page.main: John Nugent (fl. 1904) was an English-born footballer who played in the Football League for Notts County.

response: * Patrick John Nugent (born 1943), first husband of Luci Baines Johnson
* John Nugent (journalist) (1821–1880), journalist and agent of United States President James Buchanan
